author: alintulu
body:
#### PR description:

This PR includes:
- The addition of a new Scouting format for Run3. A new class (Run3ScoutingParticleV2) has been created that adds several features of the PF Candidate `bestTrack()` to the old class Run3ScoutingParticle. This new format was developed to include the variables necessary to run b-tagging with ParticleNet, and has also been identified as helpful for additional analyses groups.
- A new producer (HLTScoutingPFProducerV2.cc) that, in addition to filling the class Run3ScoutingParticleV2, also includes:
   - Reduced precision of vertex and jet quantities.
   - Configurable option (`doCandIndsForJets`) which dictates if the output should contain the indices of the PF constituents of the jet.
- Reduced precision of the vertex  quantities in the primary vertex producer.
- Pt cut (default value of 0.3) for tracks in the track producer.

#### PR validation:

I ran `scram b runtests` as well as runTheMatrix. On lxplus runTheMatrix came back with 9 fails but all due to `DAS_ERROR`.
title: Add new Scouting Run3 format
